episodesJson.description: For series info, see Item 3659. This prog.: See previous entry. Also: Musical content of this series spans Bloch's life. This prog.: Andante for String Quartet (1895), Macbeth: Two Interludes; Schelomo, Hebraic Rhapsody for Cello and Orchestra

series.title: Ernest Bloch: The man and his music
